page.title: 08LAMBING IN SKERRIES
page.content: I love the lambing time of the year. My daddy lambed one sheep and it had twins. They were very poor. Grannie had to take them in her house because their mother did not lick them. If they have not been licked it means the lambs might die because being licked brings them to life. She looked after them. After a while they started to walk so they went back to their mummy to stay the night in the barn. Then in the morning they went in the yard and we went to see them. One was lying with their mummy and the other was lying beside a green tub. When we went up to the top of the yard to see them one came to meet us and I was able to hold it. They nearly died but they pulled through. I love the lambing time.
